      • reregister

        public static void reregister(java.lang.String name,
                              crafttweaker.api.item.IItemStack stack)
        re-register a blade, you could replace it or modifier it. A example here val blade as IItemStack = BladeRegistry.getBladeItemStack("flammpfeil.slashblade.named.fox.white"); BladeUtils.setKillCount(blade, 114514); BladeRegistry.reregister("flammpfeil.slashblade.named.fox.white", blade); then, the default killcount for white fox is 114514 now.
        Parameters:
        name - the register name
        stack - the blade

      • named

        public static BladeTypeBuilder named(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - the register name
        Returns:
        the Builder

public static crafttweaker.api.item.IItemStack getBladeItemStack(java.lang.String name)

        Returns:
